summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a resubmission related to a client identified as Vickers. The discussion focuses on verifying the ownership of an LLC that is vested on the title, which could impact the decision on an exception related to the client's mortgage application.

persons.name: Amar Desai
persons.context: Amar Desai is the sender of the email correspondence discussing the mortgage resubmission.

persons.name: Amy Wilkerson
persons.context: Amy Wilkerson is a recipient of the email, involved in the mortgage resubmission process.

persons.name: Rebecca LeFebre
persons.context: Rebecca LeFebre is the sender of the initial email regarding the mortgage resubmission.

persons.name: Edward Cabrera
persons.context: Edward Cabrera is copied on both emails discussing the mortgage resubmission.

keyFacts: The email correspondence discusses a mortgage resubmission for a client named Vickers.
There is a concern regarding the verification of the borrower's sole ownership of an LLC that is vested on the title.
The title work indicates that the property is in an LLC, which could affect the exception decision.
